languages.text: {n}Вы ловите себя на странном ощущении: кажется, несмотря на суровый тон, Хейнрикс зол не на то, что вы нарушили закон. В каждом его слове звенит тревога — о вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы ловите себя на странном ощущении: кажется, несмотря на суровый тон, Хейнрикс зол не на то, что вы нарушили закон. В каждом его слове звенит тревога — о вас.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}You are suddenly struck by a strange realisation — despite his severe tone, Heinrix is not angry that you broke the law. His every word rings with concern — for you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы ловите себя на странном ощущении: кажется, несмотря на суровый тон, Хейнрикс зол не на то, что вы нарушили закон. В каждом его слове звенит тревога — о вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You are suddenly struck by a strange realisation — despite his severe tone, Heinrix is not angry that you broke the law. His every word rings with concern — for you.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}你突然意识到了一件古怪的事情。尽管海因里希的语气非常严厉，但他并没有因为你违背法律的行为而感到愤怒。相反，他每句话都带着关切的意味——对你的关切。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are suddenly struck by a strange realisation — despite his severe tone, Heinrix is not angry that you broke the law. His every word rings with concern — for you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你突然意识到了一件古怪的事情。尽管海因里希的语气非常严厉，但他并没有因为你违背法律的行为而感到愤怒。相反，他每句话都带着关切的意味——对你的关切。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}De pronto te asalta una revelación. A pesar de su tono severo, Heinrix no está enfadado porque has roto la ley. Sus palabras encierran preocupación... por ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are suddenly struck by a strange realisation — despite his severe tone, Heinrix is not angry that you broke the law. His every word rings with concern — for you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De pronto te asalta una revelación. A pesar de su tono severo, Heinrix no está enfadado porque has roto la ley. Sus palabras encierran preocupación... por ti.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたは不意に、奇妙な事に気がついた…厳しい口調にもかかわらず、ハインリックスはあなたが法を犯したことに腹を立てているわけではない。彼の言葉の端々には、あなたへの心配が感じられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are suddenly struck by a strange realisation — despite his severe tone, Heinrix is not angry that you broke the law. His every word rings with concern — for you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは不意に、奇妙な事に気がついた…厳しい口調にもかかわらず、ハインリックスはあなたが法を犯したことに腹を立てているわけではない。彼の言葉の端々には、あなたへの心配が感じられる。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Soudain, vous vous rendez compte que malgré la sévérité de son ton, Heinrix ne vous en veut pas d'avoir enfreint la loi. S'il semble inquiet, c'est pour vous et non à cause de ce que vous avez fait.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are suddenly struck by a strange realisation — despite his severe tone, Heinrix is not angry that you broke the law. His every word rings with concern — for you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, vous vous rendez compte que malgré la sévérité de son ton, Heinrix ne vous en veut pas d'avoir enfreint la loi. S'il semble inquiet, c'est pour vous et non à cause de ce que vous avez fait.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich kommt dir der komische Gedanke, dass Heinrix trotz seines strengen Tons gar nicht wütend ist, dass du gegen das Gesetz verstoßen hast. Bei jedem seiner Worte schwingt eine gewisse Sorge mit – um dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are suddenly struck by a strange realisation — despite his severe tone, Heinrix is not angry that you broke the law. His every word rings with concern — for you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich kommt dir der komische Gedanke, dass Heinrix trotz seines strengen Tons gar nicht wütend ist, dass du gegen das Gesetz verstoßen hast. Bei jedem seiner Worte schwingt eine gewisse Sorge mit – um dich.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Aniden fark ettiğin tuhaflıkla şaşkına dönüyorsun. Heinrix, ciddi ses tonuna rağmen kanunları çiğnediğin için öfkeli değil. Ağzından dökülen her bir söz, endişe dolu. Senin için endişeleniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You are suddenly struck by a strange realisation — despite his severe tone, Heinrix is not angry that you broke the law. His every word rings with concern — for you.{/n}
